record.description: In recognition of their scholastic standing and leadership, these University of Chicago students have been chosen student marshals and aides, the school's highest appointive honor. Seated, left to right: Gladys Gerner, Mary P. Rix, Helen Woodrich, Elizabeth Barden, Mary Anna Patrick and William Louis (kneeling); standing: Winston H. Bostick, Ralph Leach, Betty Benson, Frances Protheroe, Hildegard Breihan, Elroy Golding, William H. McNeill, and Herbert Larson.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
